content.prompt: Write a program that given an array of integers variable called array prints in the console the the number of inversions happening in the array. An inversion occurs every time two neighboring elements are out of sorted order. For example, is array[3]=5 and array[4]=1 then those two elements are not in sorted order, because a smaller number comes after a larger number, this is called an inversion.Please note that you have to complete the method numOfInversions(int [] input).

uses.used_by: Jordan Barria, Jordan Barria - University Of Pittsburgh
